heading: must watch
review: this is a must watch movie fully comedy its a adult comedy as good as godfather when i watch this movie first i supposed it to be as good as Hollywood godfather directed by a well established director its better than 3 idiots and far better than American pie usually its competed by raamgopal Verna's aag i think we should nominate it for Oscar awards this the best nominated movie in iifa2011 initially Robert Downey Jr.was hired for this movie but later he refused after knowing that this will be a threat to his own production film ironman1 and 2 even than its much better than iron-man without Robert Downey Jr. himesh reshamiya asked to give music for this movie
